key_85.name: Grateful Dead
key_85.set1: Acoustic: Me And Bobby McGee*, Bye Bye Love*, Lucifer's Eyes*, Children Of The Eighties*, Banks Of The Ohio*
key_85.set2: Electric-1: Shakedown Street, Me & My Uncle-> Mexicali Blues, Cold Rain & Snow, CC Rider**, It Must Have Been The Roses*-> Beat It On Down The Line, Big Boss Man**-> Minglewood Blues**, Don't Ease Me In
key_85.set3: Electric-2: Iko Iko*, Playin' In The Band-> Terrapin Station-> Playin' In The Band-> Drums-> The Other One***-> Not Fade Away***-> Goin' Down The Road Feelin' Bad***-> Morning Dew; Encore aka Electric-3: Dark Star-> Bertha-> Good Lovin', It's All Over Now Baby Blue*
key_85.comment: *W Joan Baez, **W Matt Kelly, ***W John Cippolina. First Set Acoustic; Bill Graham flew in on a joint at midnight
